mapper.select:
select c.* from (select b.* from (select count(a.guid) rowcount$$, a.* from sa_systrack a
and a.createtime >=#CREATETIMESTART:DATE# and #CREATETIMEEND:DATE#>=a.createtime and a.createuserguid=#CREATEUSERGUID# and a.sid=#SID#
$ORDERBY$ ) b ) c
